ai-tha-ap90:1.2_0: having fallen under the sway of material things.
ai-tha-ap90:2.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
ai-tha-ap90:3.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap90:4.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Vāsava.
ai-tha-ap90:5.1_0: the eighth part of the senior monk.
